text: Daniel James Licht (March 13, 1957 â€“ August 2, 2017) was an American movie composer and musician. He was born in Massachusetts and raised in Detroit, Michigan. Licht was best known for composing the score for Showtime TV drama series, Dexter and for the movie Children of the Night. He was also known for composing the video game score of Silent Hill. Licht died on August 2, 2017 in Los Angeles, California of liposarcoma at the age of 60.Variety, "Daniel Licht, composer "Dexter", "Children of the Corn" dead" 4 August 2017 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from liposarcoma Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American movie score composers Category:Musicians from Massachusetts Category:Musicians from Detroit
title: Daniel Licht
